charges.description: FAILED TO MAINTAIN RESIDENCY WITHIN NEW YORK STATE , AND WAS OBSERVED ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS AT NEW JERSEY LOCATIONS PRIOR TO THE START OF HIS TOUR OF DUTY.

FAILED TO MAKE PROPER AND NECESSARY ENTRIES IN HIS ACTIVITY LOG.
